name: Spawn System
description: Custom spawn manager with configurable spawn points

scripts.description: Custom spawn point manager with selection logic
Component for individual spawn point entities

instructions:
1. Edit SpawnManager to implement spawn point selection logic
2. Edit SpawnPointComponent to define availability rules
3. Create the spawn point prefab with prefab_create
4. Attach SpawnManager to your game mode prefab
5. Place spawn point prefabs in the world
6. Mod the SCR_RespawnSystemComponent to use your custom manager
7. Test with multiple players connecting and respawning
